acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle Singletons with parameters in the static method
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleSingletonsWithParametersInPublicStaticMethod

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SingletonWithParametersInStaticFactoryPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the String field PqzGZRZoZ9 cannot be null or empty

Then the List<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 56 byteObjectField = 113 shortField = 69 shortObjectField = 39 charField = L charObjectField = 4 intField = 1860213150 intObjectField = 110743662 longField = 1713281183194225 longObjectField = 1713281181890501 floatField = 0.21346194 floatObjectField = 0.89987385 doubleField = 0.7500253781316211 doubleObjectField = 0.974569815745715 stringField = W2ZOU7GvWH objectField = java.lang.Object@af47f1b calendarField = Sun Sep 27 14:32:29 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Sep 27 14:32:29 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@4d0f58a9 intArray = [I@6d0e2a12 booleanArray = [Z@6a2e7d2d bigDecimalField = 413726420501 ) should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element

Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{X8b8wqlSCM=OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 112 byteObjectField = 1 shortField = 16 shortObjectField = 27 charField = R charObjectField = U intField = 810449459 intObjectField = -1767103073 longField = 1713281225204701 longObjectField = 1713281223970713 floatField = 0.3971721 floatObjectField = 0.31210065 doubleField = 0.9361433936349305 doubleObjectField = 0.19542265408007076 stringField = UNfyLrSmb1 objectField = java.lang.Object@6492428e calendarField = Sun Sep 27 14:32:29 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Sep 27 14:32:29 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@352f9163 intArray = [I@22be4867 booleanArray = [Z@11b023ba bigDecimalField = 253427735655 ) should contain at least one non empty element
